attributes.action: To have less hours in school
attributes.additional_details: Because we’re in school for like 7 hours and when we come home we’re tired that we just want to sleep
attributes.background: To change the hours from 7 to 6 or 5 hours

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions we have open on similar topics:

Start school at 10am to help teenagers with tiredness
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612113

Require schools to make Friday a part of the school weekend
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597715

Allow schools to open all year round, for fewer days per week
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605184
